Description:
More Than The Eye Can See...
You will be amazed by what this Cowes unit has to offer!
This recently renovated 3 bedroom unit, has been stylishly transformed to provide a bright contemporary space. With a neutral colour palette, and practical floor plan - it is ready for the new owner to move in.
The unit offers open plan living, kitchen and dining areas, 3 generous sized bedrooms all with built in robes, serviced by a family bathroom and separate laundry.
At the front of the complex, there is common ground including ample car parking and an outdoor entertaining area. The unit also offers a private low maintenance courtyard at the rear.
Also featuring:-
Split system heating/cooling
Dishwasher (new)
Electric Hot Water System (new)
There is no body corporate in place, the only expense is public liability insurance for the common space at the front of the complex.
Situated close to Thompson Avenue, and walking distance to the beach, this property would be an ideal addition to your investment portfolio, or for holiday or permanent living.
You must see this property for yourself - inspection will not disappoint!
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.
Insights: 3/7 Perlis Avenue, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2019 and 12 other 3 bedroom unit in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
TITLED EAST WEST ALLOTMENT WITH WATER VIEWS.
This allotment of approx. 713m2 is in the perfect location with a frontage of 18m and a north facing boundary over looking the beautiful Shearwater Lake.
Titled land and ready to build a new home and take advantage of the northerly aspect over the lake.
The SHEARWATER estate is a great place to live with spectacular wetlands area, boardwalks and walking tracks. The estate is centrally located to the Phillip Island golf course, with the front nine at your doorstep and the back nine running along the length of the estate.
Silverleaves Beach is only a short walk (700m approx) away, with the Heath Lands of Rhyll and walking track just a short distance in the opposite direction.
Call Alex Scott Cowes today on 5952 2633 to secure your land or call about our available H&L Packages.
Insights: 1 WATERFORD DRIVE, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
Modern Living on The Island
Capturing the essence of modern island living is this beautifully presented home situated within the popular Whytesands Estate in Cowes on an allotment of approx 501 square metres. Your north facing deck maximising the property's superb sunny orientation will welcome you into your contemporary new home.
The property features vaulted ceilings, evaporative cooling, electric external awnings on bedroom windows and, a 5kw solar and 3.5kw solar battery offering the perfect opportunity for a permanent living solution or holiday home. The home comprises three bedrooms including the master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite whilst the other two bedrooms feature built in robes and share the family bathroom with separate toilet. The home also boasts beautiful cabinetry and timberlook flooring in the large open plan kitchen, living and dining area.
You will have the height of privacy in your low maintenance garden including vegetable garden beds and an incredible outdoor entertainment area featuring a fantastic gazebo that will stay at the property. Planning to make the most of your entertainment opportunities? Cook up a storm in your kitchen with stainless steal appliances and electric cooktop and under bench oven. The kitchen also includes an incredible bench top area allowing bar style seating for the perfect breakfast location.
The property boasts three large sheds and an additional garden shed for plenty of storage. If that is not enough space then it is only a short 300m approx walk to the family friendly Whytesands Park, with BBQ facility, zip line, basketball court and football and soccer field keeping the whole family entertained. You'll also be only a short drive to the local shops, cafes, Primary School, doctors and a short stroll to the beaches.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.
Insights: 1 Waldorf Road, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2019 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
Constantly Sought, Rarely Found!
This neat and complete package is perfectly suited for holiday makers, permanent living and investors alike. Located at the rear, with its own private access, this three bedroom unit is within easy walking distance to a variety of amenities including schools, shops and only an easy 400m stroll to the Cowes north facing beach.
Single level and spacious in its design, the open plan living, kitchen and dining area offers a great space to enjoy the company of family and friends. The relaxed open flow carries out through sliding doors to an expansive outdoor entertainment decking area complimented by a lovely lawn.
Comprising three generous sized bedrooms, all with built in robes, including the master bedroom with an ensuite whilst the other two bedrooms share the family bathroom with bath and separate shower.
Additional features include a separate toilet and laundry with outdoor access, split system heating and cooling, 1 car garage and a garden shed for further storage and a fully fenced backyard.
Set on 392sqm (approx.) with the flexibility for either permanent/holiday rental, or for personal use, this property offers a wonderful investment opportunity, and there is no common property or Body Corporate.
This property in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

Description:
Central Location, Less Than 100 metres To The Beach!
Situated in the heart of Cowes and less than 100 metres to the beautiful bay beach is this recently refurbished ground floor brick unit comprising two bedrooms with built in robes, an open plan kitchen, dining and living area, bathroom and laundry. Within walking distance to restaurants, cafes and shops, this neat and solid unit is the perfect weekender, investment property or affordable, low maintenance permanent residence. The unit features a north facing outdoor area, new timber look flooring, stylish bathroom and split system heating and cooling; a great offering in this brilliant location!

Description:
Prime Position
This quality apartment boasts one of the most desirable locations. Directly across the road from the Cowes foreshore, and only 100m to the best local cafes and eateries the apartment is architecturally designed and will not disappoint.
Featuring two bedrooms with built in robes, a bathroom with bath and separate shower, feature bar area, an open plan living/dining/kitchen area with stainless steel appliances that sweeps on to a north facing courtyard with spectacular water views. Split system heating and cooling is set up throughout the apartment to cater for year round comfort.
Currently tenanted this property requires 24 hours notice to inspect.

Description:
ONE OF THE BEST
This is one of the best units we've seen, in this very popular location at Cowes.
'The Sails' townhouses offers everything, with a great location close to a beautiful swimming beach, a very close easy walk to town plus a swimming pool for the kids.
This unit offers 3 spacious bedrooms all with built in robes, two bathrooms, a huge upstairs open plan living area, a big sunny balcony big enough for summer alfresco dining on a generous sized table, a large double garage and a downstairs study area, that could easily accommodate a couch and another tv for the kids.
This home is being offered fully furnished so all you need to do is move in and enjoy your time.
Don't miss this, if you're looking for a holiday investment property, this has to be on the list.

Description:
ISLAND LIVING
This immaculately presented home on a 705 m2 block is ready for the next family to enjoy. With the local Primary school only a 2 minute stroll around the corner and the local shopping strip a little further. This home is light and bright upon entering, an open lounge with north facing windows and central split system, hardwood flooring and quality carpets in the bedrooms. The newly updated kitchen has a 900mm electric oven, new dishwasher and a generous dining area. Also with ceiling fans in the lounge and master.
With three good sized bedrooms - centrally located bathroom, separate toilet, plus separate updated laundry that leads out to the rear undercover entertaining deck, through to a rear yard which is fully fenced.
This property would be a great investment to work from home, with a large shed that has 2 x deep garages plus a side work shop area. The high clearance garage roller doors are 3.2 metre in height, with a 20-amp power outlet. Security yard lighting.
The large back yard still has ample room for turning and reversing a light vehicle, with ease. Fully fenced with large gates into the rear yard and there is off road parking at the front. New decking at the entry and landscaped gardens with an east road frontage.
Disclaimer - We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au

Description:
Perfect permanent residence or ideal holiday home!
This four bedroom, two living and two bathroom home really does tick all the boxes. There is a generous sized master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite at the front and a central open plan kitchen/living space is light filled and features stone bench tops; a great place to entertain.
The main living area flows out onto the alfresco decking and the fully fenced back yard. The second living area is wired for surround sound and entertainment system perfect for the kids!! There is a large, double garage with mezzanine area, and extra parking at the rear of the property perfect for a caravan or boat. Solar panels ensure the home is energy efficient, split system heating and cooling throughout.
Situated in the Whyte Sands Estate, you are only a stones through away from central Cowes and the ever popular north facing beaches in town.

Description:
Impeccably presented
Located in the heart of Cowes, this period style home is only a short stroll to all that central Cowes has to offer. The home is impeccably presented and situated on a huge 909m2 (approx) allotment.
Comprising of three large bedrooms, all with built in robes, the master with an ensuite and walk in robe plus a central family bathroom with shower and luxurious spa bath. The open plan kitchen and living zone is complemented by a contemporary country style kitchen with granite bench tops, spotted gum flooring and ample storage space. Alfresco dining flows from the kitchen living zone, opening out onto a north facing rear yard.
The second living area has a decorative fire place and is a great space for the family to retreat to. Additional features of the home are soaring ceilings throughout, split system heating and cooling throughout the property and in each bedroom.
The double oversize garage has direct entry into the home. There is a barn style shed with loads of space to store your caravan/boat, with high roller doors and loads more. The property is fully fenced with a side driveway to the right of the property.
Inspections are sure to impress!

Description:
OFFERS INVITED
Located in an exclusive cul-de-sac, at the quiet end of Church Street, only a short 350m stroll to a very private beach and also 350m to the nature walk leading to Red Rocks Beach.
This near new townhouse is perfect for those who want to escape the rat race and spend quiet leisurely time beachside and, if the need for shopping arises, only 5 min to the Cowes main street by car.
Set over two levels, this stunning townhouse is superbly appointed,with quality furnishings. The upstairs area consists of the master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite with walk in shower & spa, and a beautiful open plan kitchen, dining and living area, with split system air conditioning offering year round comfort. The fully equipped kitchen, includes large walk in pantry, 900mm stainless steel electric oven with gas cooktop, and stainless steel dishwasher. The island bench offers convenient, relaxed dining. The dining area leads to the living area and then out to a covered balcony.
Downstairs there are 2 bright and airy bedrooms with built in robes, both serviced by an impressive main bathroom with bath plus separate powder room. The laundry is conveniently located in the single garage which has direct access into the townhouse, as well as access to a generous rear courtyard with low maintenance landscaped gardens.
A bonus is the ample storage- a lock up shed in the rear yard, lock up storage under the staircase, and large linen cupboard.
Being offered fully furnished, this townhouse is ready and waiting for you to move straight in, or earn an income from established holiday rental clientelle.

Description:
Lazy Days
Have you been waiting for a property that you can walk into and do nothing?
Think we just found it for you!
Immaculate in presentation, practical in design and would impress the keenest of entertainers.
3 bedrooms, plus study, 3 separate living zones, 2 outdoor living spaces, spa, the list goes on!
The owners of this home have truly thought of everything, to make this a comfortable option for permanent living, or for a luxurious holiday escape.
Easy to maintain gardens, extra wide double garage with rear access providing plenty of space to store the van or boat, and a garden shed, this 510sqm approx. block has so much to offer!
Also featuring:-
Slow combustion wood fire
Split system heating / cooling
Quality 900mm appliances
Stone benchtops
Whether its an afternoon spent with the kids at the popular Whytesands park, a stroll down the track at the rear of the estate - down to the foreshore, a bike ride into town, or grab the boards and take a 10 minute car trip to one of our amazing surf beaches - everything that Phillip Island has to offer is within easy reach!
If you are ready to sit back, and enjoy coastal lifestyle without having to spend your sunny days working on that long to-do list of property maintenance - contact us today to arrange a sneak peak at this amazing home!

Description:
Bella Summer If Its Location You Are After..
With uninterrupted views straight down Osbourne Avenue towards the Cowes Yacht Club and foreshore, this is the perfect holiday or permanent abode.
Situated on a fully fenced, low maintenance allotment, with exposed aggregate driveway, this property has great street appeal, and is a great exhibit of contemporary Cowes living.
Situated over 2 floors, this spacious home is larger than you would expect.
The ground floor comprises of a spacious entrance/hallway, internal access to the single garage, large laundry/ bathroom, separate powder room, living area complete with a kitchenette, which leads out onto the private rear yard, and 2 generous bedrooms.
Upstairs, striking timber floors help create a practical and stylish living space, with open plan kitchen, living dining and entertaining balcony - boasting fabulous water views. The well designed kitchen features an island bench, stone benchtops, quality appliances and is incorporated into the living space making it ideal for entertaining.
The master bedroom, with an ample sized walk in robe, and ensuite featuring double basins and spa bath, separate powder room and additional storage complete the home.
The property is separately titled, with no body corporate. The current owners run the property as a successful holiday rental "Bella Summer", and it is providing great annual returns. There is also the option to purchase fully furnished.
Leave the car at home, this property is walking distance to everything that Cowes has to offer including a great range of cafes and restaurants, and boutique shopping. This location is also an ideal base for seeing the Islands tourist attractions including the Penguin Parade, Churchill Island, the Nobbies, Koala Conservation Centre, wineries and some of the best surf spots in Victoria.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Stylish, Central and Secure
This immaculate light filled unit of brick construction and quality fittings throughout is located in an excellent position within walking distance to the gorgeous beach and main shopping centre of Cowes.
With low maintenance surrounds and good provision for parking with single carport and single remote garage, the unit itself offers a very spacious open plan living, dining and kitchen area with stone bench tops and gleaming tiled floor, three generous bedrooms including the master with ensuite.
Additional features include: 2 x split systems heating/cooling, dishwasher, stone bench tops throughout, outdoor undercover entertaining area, 2000ltr water tank, and exposed aggregate concrete driveways.
This quality built home would ideally suit as a holiday or permanent home for those looking for convenience and simplicity, or as an exceptional investment opportunity.

Description:
Option To Purchase Fully Furnished - Walk In Walk Out!
Life's a beach that can be your daily mantra once you secure this impressive seaside abode. With a hop, skip and a jump you will find yourself at the peaceful water's edge of Western Port Bay.
This is your opportunity to secure a fantastic home in the tightly held Red Rocks location.
As you enter the home you will automatically feel the sense of relaxation and like you're on holidays. Once through the front entrance you are greeted with an open and bright spance of the open plan family/meals kitchen area, with sliding doors leading out to the A shady verandah, and large undercover entertaining deck (with café blinds for all year round comfort) create great outdoor living spaces.
This immaculately presented 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home, has been well cared for and maintained by the current owners, and would be an attractive option for permanent, holiday or investment buyers. There is also the option to purchase fully furnished.
Along with a functional floor plan and some great features:-
Split system heating and cooling
Cozy slow combustion wood heater
Dishwasher
Near new hot water service
Garden shed and under deck storage
Situated on a generous 628sqm approx. allotment, with low maintenance surrounds with side access perfect for the caravan or boat, and only a 400m approx stroll to the pristine north facing Red Rocks beach, and a short drive into town - properties in this area don't last - phone today to arrange an inspection!
This property is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
What A Location!
Positioned a mere 100 metres (approx) to the amazing north facing bay beach of Cowes is this much loved family holiday home situated on an impressive 1006 square metre (approx) allotment offering exceptional opportunities for your own use or development.
The modest home is being offered fully furnished on a walk in/walk out basis and comprises a spacious open plan living, dining and kitchen area with polished timber floors throughout the living space and split system heating and cooling, a bathroom, separate toilet and a hallway leading to the three bedrooms all featuring high ceilings. The main bedroom is generous in size and boasts built in robes and split system heating and cooling. The kitchen offers plenty of storage and bench space as well as a good sized pantry.
The covered north facing outdoor entertaining area is ideal for year round use and comes complete with cafe blinds. Attached to the home is a double carport whilst at the rear of the property is a huge shed with high sliding doors to accommodate the largest of boats! There is also a separate smaller shed with a roller door, a third smaller shed and an original free standing brick barbecue.
This is a fabulous property for the whole family to enjoy and take advantage of the brilliant proximity to the beach and shops.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

Description:
The Ultimate Location!
On offer is this beautifully renovated weatherboard home, located in the heart of Cowes. The huge allotment boasts loads of potential to investors or those looking for a permanent residence within walking distance to the main street, shops, cafes, schools, doctors and all that Cowes has to offer.
The single storey home comprises three robed bedrooms, two bathrooms, an enormous central open plan living/kitchen/dining area complimented by electric oven and stove and laminate benchtops.
Other features include; polished timber and tile flooring throughout, combustion heater, split system heating and cooling and evaporative cooling, undercover entertainment deck, huge single lockup garage with plenty of accommodation for to store a boat or caravan.
All of this on a fully fenced 1303sqm approx. allotment. Inspection is by private appointment

Description:
What A Location!
Located on the ground floor in the Phillip Island Apartment complex is this stylish two-bedroom apartment that is beautifully positioned only 100m from the popular north facing Cowes Beach and the Cowes shopping precinct including some great cafes and restaurants. The architect designed complex boasts lovely gardens and an attractive pool area including a spa; ideal for all ages.
The apartment is offered fully furnished and features two good sized robed bedrooms, a bath with shower over, separate toilet a second separate shower and laundry.
The open plan kitchen, living and dining space, complimented by beautiful timber floors throughout, flows out onto a very private covered outdoor area. Enjoy all day sun all year round on the balcony; a perfect place to relax, unwind and entertain your guests.
For clever investors, this apartment is a fantastic occasional weekender, while still receiving an income from the holiday letting managed by Phillip Island Apartments. Alternatively, you can choose to have this wonderful apartment solely for your own use. The possibilities are endless!
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.
